title: Beauty of Eiffel Tower
text: Never miss out to drop by to visit Eiffel Tower especially nite to see the beautiful view It was the World's structure for 41 years and also iconic symbol of Paris, France and the world... Worth to visit the beauty of historical Eiffel Tower as one of its World Heritage Sites

title: Warm welcome by staff
text: I feel welcome by hot staff, Balint... He is so friendly and show me where to go best places in Budapest... Love this hotel bed as it so comfort which make sleep well Hotel is close to metro and walk 15 min to Chain Bridge... From Chain Bridge, can walk along to enjoy beautiful view ahead to Great Market Hall and other attraction places

title: Awesome stay in Paris
text: I have been to Paris twice but I stayed at different Ibis in my last trip... I decided to stay this Ibis paris montmartre 18 which I made the right choice The staff is so friendly and helpful especially Isabell who guide me where to go nearby the hotel and most attraction places... The room is so awesome with bigger space and also the bathroom is huge too... The best is the bed so comfortable which make me enjoyed my beauty sleep Breakfast is not bad too served with different type of bread, fruits and salad... Halal Turkish Restaurant is nearby the hotel which open late... Walking distance to station and basilica Sacre Coeur and Moulin Rouge, Cinema and Starbucks from hotel

title: Amazing stay and staff
text: I feel welcome by staff, Lea and Pilar... The staff is friendly and helpful especially Lea and Pilar... Pilar got great smile and happy to serve me as a special guest for my needs... Simple breakfast is all I needed... Room is clean and tidy... I can view amazing city view from my room in new wing... Hotel is close to metro and walking distance to markets and Tower Bridge... This hotel is deserved more than 3 ★
place: ibis Budget London Whitechapel - Brick Lane

title: Best Palace Stay in Venezia
text: I really fall in love staying in this hotel with great hospitality and staff are so bravo & brava, friendly and helpful especially Eduard and Elisa Fratter for their great customer services with their great smile... Eduard will ensure everything is on good hand during my stay... Manager, Jacopo served me like VIP guest to arrange necessary of my needs... Love the bed so comfort which make me sleep like sleeping beauty and lazy to wake up the next morning Bathroom is super big with everything needed... Breakfast is good with fresh bread and salad and fresh fruits and many more... Hotel is walking distance to main station, water boat and attraction places to enjoy beautiful view of Venezia... Will come back again to stay like Palace Carnival Palace deserved more than 5 ★ for their great hospitality to value me as their VIP guest

title: Yummy pasta in Venezia
text: Love pasta so yummy and deliciousAlso, their Tiramisu is home made dessert so delicious too Never miss this pasta cafe when drop by Venezia... Close to Grand Canal and other attraction places
place: Pasta & Pasta - Fresh Pasta To Go

title: Awesome stay to be welcome by staff
text: I feel welcome by staff, Maria and Gagan when I check in... The staff is so friendly and helpful especially Gagan show me where to go around Vienna... Love the bed so comfort which make me sleep like sleeping beauty Also, love hotel coffee mix with chocolate which hotel provide free for guests... Halal kebab is just across the hotel... Hotel is close to metro and so easy to use metro to go to best attraction places

title: Shopping Street
text: Stephansplatz is situated in the heart of Vienna. Walking distance to St. Stephan Cathedral Church and Hofburg Palace... It is surrounded by shopping area and cafe... Enjoy beautiful and historical buiding around the area... It is closed on Sunday for shopping areas except cafe... Must visit if drop by Vienna...

title: Beautiful Church
text: This beautiful and historic church is the symbol of Vienna and was built in 12th Century which is more than 800 years ago... Also it's become one of the most important Gothic structures in Austria and heritage site throughout the world... The design is an amalgamation of Romanesque and Gothic architectural styles... Must see to visit this historical church when drop by Vienna

title: Amazing Historical Palace
text: Hofburg Imperial Palace was orignially a medieval castle... It was originally a fortified castle which dates back to the 13th century about 800 years ago... Also, it is a symbol of the Austrian culture and royalty... It is located in the heart of Vienna... The power-house of the Austrian empire, it holds a wealth of rich culture and history... Must see this beautiful palace when visiting Vienna...

title: Awesome Coffee
text: Never miss starbucks whenever I go Awesome coffee make me awake as always☕☕☕ Grab starbucks before I go back to my hotel☕☕

title: Awesome stay
text: I feel welcome by the staff when I check in... The staff is friendly and helpful especially Aris Mattina and Maria assist where to go to best places in the city... Love the bed as it so comfort which make me sleep so good The hotel is close to metro so easily use metro to attraction places

title: Antique beautiful hotel
text: I fall in love with this hotel so much of its unique and antique with historical design platform I feel welcome by staff, Eva when I check in... Also, Josef is very friendly and helpful to assist me where to go around Prague... Love the bed so much as it is so comfort which make me sleep like sleeping beauty I met the owner of this hotel and I feel welcome by the owner also he is so friendly... The hotel is close to tram and walking distance to Charles Bridge and other main attraction places... No regret to stay in this hotel and really worth to drop by this awesome antique hotel in Prague

title: Beautiful library
text:
It is a hidden treasure with 19th century artistocrat mansion, turned into a library, hidden in a modern library... Also, it is the largest library network in Budapest...
Should visit level 4 to visit the gateway to the Palace Quarter...This library has fantastic neo-baroque building is definitely worth a visit

title: Best Pedestrian Street
text: It is located in the city center and also one of the world’s most attractive pedestrian shopping streets... It is filled with restaurant, cafe and shops and also it is touristy so usually crowded... Never miss out if visited Budapest, take a walk along this famous downtown street...

title: Historical Monument
text: Heroes’ Square is the city's iconic symbols and the Millennium Memorial in Budapest. Surrounded by two important buildings, Museum of Fine Arts and Kunsthalle (Hall of Art)... It was erected to commemorate the 1000-year-old history of the Magyars... The crescent-shaped monument was built in Eclectic style... This monument is impressive with its beauty when viewed from a distance

title: Beautiful Church
text: It is the largest church in Budapest and the name of Basilica was given in the memory of Hungary’s first king, St. Stephen... It is located in the heart of the city and was built in Neo-Classical style with two large bell towers.. It took more than 50 years to build the Basilica... Admission is Free but can give donation of 200 HUF – 1 EUR...

title: Beautiful Parliament Building
text: It is so stunning located on the Pest embankment of the Danube river... Also, it is the third largest parliament in the world and refers as House of the Country... The building is over 100 years old... Looking at the Parliament from a distance to enjoy the beauty view and harmony of the building...

title: Beautiful Castle
text: Buda Castle is one of the main symbols of Budapest... Admire the World Heritage sights of Buda Castle Also, it giving the opportunity to enjoy an amazing view... It is also known as the Royal Palace and is part of the World Heritage... Never miss this beautiful castle if drop by at Budapest

title: Beautiful view
text: It is a 140m high dolomite rock rising above the Danube in Buda.Really beautiful view when you walk along Chain Bridge It is wonderful experience and a good first impression of the city From the Gellért Hill, can enjoy a stunning view of Budapest, with almost all major attractions possible to see the Parliament, Chain Bridge, Stephens Basilica, the Castle, Matthias Church, Big Market Hall and the Heroes Square…Never miss Gellert Hill if you drop by Budapest

title: Great market
text: It is the most beautiful Budapest market hall... It was built in 1897 with beautiful tiled roofs and a colourful facade of patterned orange bricks. You find great food and gifts in this market... You can walk from Chain Bridge to enjoy the beautiful view before reach at Central Market Hall

title: Beautiful bridge
text: This bridge is beautiful close to Central Market Hall and it is shortest bridge in Budapest... This bridge is spanning over the river Danube to connect the flat Pest side with the hilly Buda side of Budapest...

title: Beautiful bridge
text: It was the first permanent stone bridge connecting Pest and Buda and the most well known bridge in Hungary... Beautiful and historical bridge I ever seen... Enjoy beautiful view while walking along the bridge Must visit when drop by at Budapest

title: Beautiful bridge
text: It is historic bridge which built of sandstone blocks in Prague... It enjoy fairy-tale views of Prague... It can be visited any time...

title: Awesome art piece
text: This sculpture align to form the face of the famous Czech writer Franz Kafka are made of made of 24 tons of stainless steel sheet and divided into forty-two tiers... Never miss this awesome art piece if visiting Prague

title: Great Treasure
text: It is about 600 years and one of the greatest treasures in Prague... Also, it is one of world's oldest clocks... Should not miss this treasure timepieces for sightseeing
place: Old Town Hall with Astronomical Clock

title: OmG😱😱😱
text: Never miss out this awesome and unique design platform of is unique, and especially striking in the city centre... Also, it is a modern building has daring, curvy outlines surrounded by historic architecture by Vlado Milunic and the American Frank Owen Gehry to initially name as the "Fred and Ginzger Building"... Worth of visit this awesome piece of art and passion

title: Awesome
text: Coffee at starbucks is always best Starbucks at old town square always crowded... Must grab before go back to hotel
place: Starbucks Old Town Square - The Clock

title: Awesome art of passion
text: It is world famous artist painting through the Berlin Wall and make it longest last open gallery in the world... Also, it is monument to freedom of expression... It can be visited in anytime... It is close to metro station... Never miss it if drop by in Berlin Worth of visit this awesome gallery

title: Unique and beautiful hotel
text: Love this hotel because of its unique design platform I feel welcome by hotel staff, Tareq and he is friendly and cheerful to assist me where to go around Berlin... I love bed as bed is so comfort and it is best out of best which make me sleep like sleeping beauty I choose coffee room as the room is designed so unique really OmG and make me speechless when I step to my coffee room The hotel is close to metro and catch tram or metro subway to any attraction place

title: Must see sight
text: The spot remains a must-see sight in Berlin with huge historical... It is important to visit just because from 1961 to 1990 it functioned as the main entry and departing point for diplomats, journalists and non-German visitors... It was the best known border crossing during the Cold War. Worth to pay a visit

title: Beautiful piece of historical site
text: It so beautiful and make me speechless Worth to visit and never miss this Easy to catch metro to reach there

title: Grab Souvenirs and shopping for everyone
text: It is one of popular street for souvenirs and it is in the heart of Athens... It is quite close from ancient Agora and Acropolis... Many of the shops don't have price labels so try to bargain the price

title: Love Plaka
text: Plaka is old town of Athens close to Acopolis... It is extremely beautiful for its authentic character and traditional layout consists of Neoclassical houses and some shops that date back to 19th century... Also, it is close to Ermou street, the most famous shopping hub of Athens

title: Must Visit Historical Landmark
text: It well worth to visit as it is one of largest temple in the heart of Athens... It was built from 2500 years ago... Temple is half ruined so it is so precious to see what is left now for an ancient and historical piece of landmark

title: Great cappuccino
text: Relax with my hot cappuccino with Konstantinopoli Bougatsa with cream and chocolate cookie

title: Beautiful tower
text: It is one of the highest and oldest towers of Istanbul and offer 360-degree views of the city. It was built in the 14th century... You should not miss this visit

title: Famous Shopping Street
text: Ermou street is famous shopping street in Athens which turned into a pedestrian only street Also, it have international names like Benneton, Marks & Spencer,  H&M, Zara, Berksha, Sepura and more It close to Monastiraki Flea Market... Can enjoy and listen to Street Musicians along the street too

title: Ancient Heritage landmark
text: Acropolis is one of the famous and greatest of outstanding historical landmark... I managed to climb up the rock to make my way to the Greek flag to enjoy great view You should not miss this world heritage attraction

title: Beautiful Twin Towers
text: KLCC twin towers so beautiful and it stands out so stunning with design platform Worth to drop by to grab some lovely pictures

title: Yummy burger at Mcdonald
text: Love McDonald's burger as always Grab Big Mac served with ice lemon tea and chips are always my of choice

title: Beautiful Mosque
text: Love Blue Mosque as it is so beautiful with historical design platform make it so stunning and unique

title: Historical of Sultanahmet old city
text: Love this Sultanahmet old city is the heart of historic Old Istanbul Can find gift shop, food restaurant and attraction places like Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia Museum and Basilica Cistern

title: Incredible place
text: Love Basilica Cistern as it is the largest of several hundred ancient cisterns that lie beneath the city of Istanbul... Also, Tom hanks play his movie "INFERNO" I cannot believe that I can make it to visit this place

title: Amazing place
text: Love Hagia Sophia of their great architectural beauty. Also it is an important monument both for Byzantine and for Ottoman Empires Standing for around 1500 years, still one of the most outstanding monuments in Istanbul

title: Beautiful palace
text: Love Topkapi palace for their beauty of the historical design platform. I cannot believe that I can visit primary residence of the Ottoman Sultans for approximately 400 years

title: Fall in love with this amazing hotel😍😍😍
text: Love the location as it so close to Sultanahmet and Blue Mosque just walking distance from hotel Room is clean and tidy with towel, shampoo and soap... Amazing part is my room can have Sea view which make me so insane Grab yummy and delicious kebab at Ortaklar Kebab Restaurant and also super yummy delicious turkish ice cream and delight plus turkish coffee from Mado Cafe near hotel The hotel staff are super friendly and helpful who is Ali and Adnan to assist anytime so you wont get lost in anywhere in Istanbul

title: Best Turkish Ice cream and cake
text: Love their yummy and delicious ice cream and chocolate strawberry cake also their turkish coffee without sugar Turkish ice cream texture so different compared to asian and gelato ice cream Their customer services served with smileOne more thing I like is they dont force you to buy anything and will recommend you what is your preference then you decide because choice is yours You will regret if you dont drop by Mado Sultanahmet

title: Fall in love with Kebab and Pizza
text: Love their kebab either lamb or beef and turkish cheese pizza so yummy and delicious Their price is reasonable comes with big portion Their customer services are good and always served with smile You will regret if you dont drop by their delicious kebab and pizza
